availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Born on December 22, 1815 in Mercer County, Kentucky. Married Martha Ann Stone on October 17, 1842. One of the directors of the Harrodsburg Savings Institution. Died on April 12, 1898 in Knox County, Missouri.

bibl.p: Find A Grave, "Alexander Vannarsdall (December 22, 1815-April 12, 1898)," Memorial #143930156, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=143930156&ref=acom (accessed June, 9, 2017); Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Mercer County, p. 739.
